title: Duke Nukem Zero Hour playthrough -- Part 1
description: Thanks to Pogokeen for sending me this awesome game and some Canadian candies which I have enjoyed thoroughly. The game is actually much better than I expected and I'm really having fun with it. Definitely going to finish it up and possibly play through some of the other Duke games I haven't played yet.
